Package data

Class Element

java.lang.Object
data.Element
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bloc, Text
public abstract class Element
extends java.lang.Object
An element in the game is a texture that can be manipulate (push, destroy, interact) in the game. This can be a text or can be a Bloc that the player will see.
